title: A couple different fonts
content:
Hey folks, Iâ€™ve been wandering around town taking pictures of fonts and was wondering if anyone could help me identify these two:

[Building Sign](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110239/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/31667452@N02/3485360492/in/set-72157617458814918/)

and

[Historical Plaque 1](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110239/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/31667452@N02/3484547691/in/set-72157617458814918/)  
 [Historical Plaque 2](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110239/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/31667452@N02/3484547197/in/set-72157617458814918/)

If you folks have any ideas, let me know. I really like them and am at a bit of a loss as to what they are or possible could be.

Thanks.
author: aaronbell

comments.content: Thanks. I knew that the first one was handpainted. I wondered if it was based on a particular font face due to the consistency in letterform.
